ComicInfo.Summary:
Grumpy Cat is no longer Grumpy! Garfield is going on a diet and turning down lasagna! What has happened to the two most cynical cats in all of comicdom and can anything restore them to their former grumpiness and gluttony? Weâ€™ll find out in the third and final issue of this epic mini-series.
